content: this beginner-friendly granny stripe blanket pattern includes 14 sizes custom sizing instructions and a full video tutorial to guide you every step looking for an easy customizable crochet blanket pattern that s perfect for beginners the easy breezy crochet granny stripe blanket is a relaxing beginner-friendly pattern designed to help you create a beautiful blanket in any size you need whether it s your first project or your fiftieth **printable ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here in my etsy shop ** https //tidd ly/44cgihd **what s included ** a detailed step-by-step written pattern in us crochet terms 14 standard blanket sizes stroller baby crib toddler small throw medium throw large throw xl throw small afghan medium afghan large afghan twin queen king custom sizing instructions with stitch multiples so you can easily adjust to any size or yarn yardage estimates for each size a helpful tutorial photo for the border a link to a step-by-step video tutorial so you can follow along with confidence whether you re making your first granny stripe blanket or looking for a relaxing tv project this pattern is written with
